special_text:
MX-04 enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each land in your realm. You gain that much life. [i](Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)[/i]
[+2]: This planeswalker deals 3 damage to any target.
[-3]: Create a colorless Mx-04 token planeswalker with 1 starting loyalty named Replicant with “[+1]: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.” and “[-2]: Draw a card.”
